nodes.text: Gerry Duggan is a comic-book writer. He is the writer on Star Wars: Chewbacca, a limited-run Marvel Comics series. He is also the author for Beckett 1, a one-shot special comic tie-in for the film Solo: A Star Wars Story. Duggan has previously worked on Deadpool, Hulk, Infinity Gauntlet, and Nova for Marvel.
